title: TFR Ep. 602: Everything Everywhere All At Once, Jacaranda Joe, AmbuLAance, Who Dat?!?
description:
This week on the First Run, Chris and Matt catch up with yet another multiverse film in the Daniels’ ‘Everything, Everywhere All At Once’ with Michelle Yeoh. We also get into some Bay-hem with ‘Ambulance’, featuring Jake Gyllenhaal and Yahya Abdul-Mateen II. Can there be too much Everything-Go-Boom?  There’s the discussion of the big physical media releases, featuring the Straight to DVD and Streaming Picks of the Week. Then we’ll wrap up the show with everyone’s favorite role play game, Who Dat?!? featuring appearances by Johnny Hollywood, other big time CEO’s, and Christopher Lloyd. All that and more on this week’s program!

00:00-13:10: Intro/Everything Everywhere All At Once

13:11-27:16: Physical Media Picks

27:17-30:07: Romero’s Lost Short: Jacaranda Joe

30:08-41:16: AmbuLAnce

41:17-1:02:32: Who Dat?!?

1:02:33-1:04:05: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook
